trans-unit.source: Represents a day on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar" /> 上的日。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the date is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示日期是否可用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the date unavailable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果日期無法使用則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsBlackedOut" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsBlackedOut" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this button is highlighted.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示是否已反白顯示這個按鈕。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the button is highlighted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果該按鈕將反白顯示則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsHighlighted" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsHighlighted" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this button represents a day that is not in the currently displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個按鈕是否表示不在目前顯示月份中的日子。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the button represents a day that is not in the currently displayed month; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按鈕表示不在目前顯示月份中的日子則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> of a calendar is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode.Month>, it might display days that are not in that month.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>行事曆是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode.Month>，因此可能會顯示不在該月份的天數。

trans-unit.source: For example, a calendar that shows March 2009 also displays the days February 22 through February 28 and April 1 through April 4.
trans-unit.target: 例如，顯示 2009 年 3 月的行事曆也會顯示年 2 月 22 透過年 2 月 28 日和年 4 月 1 日到年 4 月 4 日。

trans-unit.source: Because those dates are not in the month of March, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton.IsInactive%2A> property is set to `true` for the buttons that represent those days.
trans-unit.target: 因為這些日期並不在 3 月的月<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton.IsInactive%2A>屬性設定為`true`代表這些發行日，按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsInactive" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsInactive" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the date represented by this button is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已選取這個按鈕表示的日期。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the date is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個日期已遭選取則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsSelected" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsSelected" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the date represented by this button is the current date.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個按鈕表示的日期是否為目前日期。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the date is the current date; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果該日期即目前的日期則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsToday" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsToday" /> 相依性屬性。
